author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
It turns out that it’s not that American citizens won’t do the jobs that are allegedly so popular with illegal immigrants; it’s just that many of them were not available. However, in what is being referred to as "Nebraska's largest worksite immigration raid," nearly “every seat in the waiting area of Glenn Valley Foods was occupied with people filling out job applications early Thursday afternoon."


So…immigration enforcement leads to a rush of applicants for those jobs from…American citizens! pic.twitter.com/9WMq6TzqQQ
— Steve Cortes (@CortesSteve) June 16, 2025
title: Meat packing plant loses employees to ICE raid, suddenly Americans are lined up looking to fill the jobs

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

If an entire industry or business solely survives due to imported, cheap labor, that may or may not be an indication that it should cease to exist. So, while the left would love it if you were to believe we would have a rotting produce epidemic if some humans are illegal, that likely could not be further from the truth. Nonetheless, Los Angeles Mayor Karen Bass would like the POTUS to know that “entire sectors of [LA’s] economy cannot function without immigrant labor.” And by “immigrant labor,” she means imported, illegal labor.

LA Mayor Karen Bass says Los Angeles “cannot function” without illegal al
title: LA Mayor accidentally makes Trump's point, claims “entire sections” of local economy would cease to exist without illegals

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Even if we acknowledge the possibility of prosecutorial bias, why should that matter when dealing with child killers?

One Portland father just had his sentence “substantially reduced” due to an alleged racial bias, and to say justice won’t be served for the innocent child would be a massive understatement.


A Portland father sentenced to life in prison for killing his daughter in 2018 received a significant reduction in his sentence due to allegations of "racial bias" related to jury selection. Darian McWoods will be released from prison in only one year and six months.

During the… pic.twitter.com/iDgX9oBbi1
— Andy Ngo (@MrAndyNgo)
title: Portland Father Who Killed His Child Gets Reduction In Time Over Alleged Racial Bias

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

The war between Israel and Iran is heating up, and today’s show breaks down whether or not the US will be getting involved and if we are about to enter World War III.

“No American troops should be involved in Israel’s war with Iran. I don’t think there should be any significant amount of U.S. dollars spent on it, and I hope Donald Trump wasn’t involved,” Crowder said. “That said, I do understand that Iran becoming a nuclear power is not a good thing.”
title: Watch: Donald Trump vs. Tucker Carlson on whether Israel is Dragging the US into War Against Iran

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

It’s unclear if anyone has ever informed the left that an immigrant, legal or not, is not a nationality or race. Still, for some reason, leftists believe these ICE raids have much to do with Mexico and nothing to do with breaking federal immigration laws and crimes post facto, but that is neither here nor there.

A singer I had never heard of, named Nezza, decided to sing the national anthem in Spanish at the Dodgers game to make a point to the Trump Administration, as she believes ICE is not doing its job correctly. And while she likely convinced zero people that no human is illegal with this stunt, we have no choice but to make fun of her, especially considering sh
title: Singer protests ICE by singing our National Anthem in Spanish, brags, “I'm proud of myself for doing that”

author: Brodigan
description:
Will Smith, the guy behind ‘Gettin’ Jiggy Wit It,’ ‘Wild Wild West,’ and ‘Men in Black’ has new music out, and it’s…well, it’s technically music. The war between Israel and Iran is heating up and it looks like the US will be getting involved. Then again, maybe not. Over the weekend, two Minnesota lawmakers were shot. The legacy media is trying to get out ahead of this by claiming he’s a violent right-wing advocate. We’re not so sure.

WILL SMITH’S NEW SONG F*CKING SUCKS
title: 🔴 WATCH LIVE! Trump vs. Tucker: Is Israel Dragging the US into War vs. Iran?

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

When conservatives see a car in front of them with an anti-Trump bumper sticker, we chuckle to ourselves and say the driver probably sits when he pees. When a liberal sees a Trump-supporting sticker in front of them at the drive-thru, they have an existential meltdown and call Dunkin' to warn them that one of their customers likes Donald Trump. And the guy who made the call? Most likely sits when he pees.

This video is going viral on X today, but it's actually from 2023. You know the routine. An anonymous TikTok account steals someone else's video, alters it slightly (like adding lines), and reposts it as their own. Then clickbait accounts on X steal the video from
title: Dude gets angry car in front of him at drive-thru is a Trump Supporter... so he calls the store to WARN them

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

Close your eyes. Picture what it would look like if lefty billionaires organized another mass protest of progressives raging against what they are told to that week. Now open your eyes. Ten bucks says what you envisioned looked EXACTLY like the "No Kings Day" tantrums you saw on Saturday. How many of you saw a boomer bashing a Trump doll on a table because of all the Trump-induced anxiety?

This took place in Beverly Hills (shocker). A woman had a table set up like Lucy's psychiatric stand. Which, as a side note, f*ck you for desecrating the sanctity of Charlie Brown and the Peanuts like that. For five cents, you could beat up a Ken doll dressed like Donald Trump. B
title: Boomer freaks out on a Trump doll to reduce his anxiety, thinks he's the normal one
